root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 8-a-1, translated into en
root.data: Objective 8. Promote sustained, inclusive and sustainable economic growth, full and productive employment and decent work for all8.a Increase Aid-for-Trade support to developing countries, in particular least developed countries, including through the Enhanced Integrated Framework for Trade-Related Technical Assistance in favor of the least developed countries8.a.1 Commitments made and disbursements made under the Aid for Trade initiative (in USD)5/1/2020 12:00:00 AMOrganisation for Economic Co-operation and DevelopmentTotal official development assistance (ODA) disbursements that can be considered aid for trade. The amount is expressed in United States of America dollars at the average annual exchange rateDollars (Administrative datadata collected dailyevery yearannuallyOECDthe indicator is relevant because it reflects the disbursement rate, which refers to the rational management of the budgetCompleteness in the collection of data in relation to external public support, as well as the harmonization of sector classificationsTotal amount of aid dedicated to tradeInternal validation and by the technical committee for statistical information (CTIS)Data are available at national levelOECD report
